DOC.detailed_description: Aim study : compare postoperative complaint ( PONV , pain , etc ) PACU discharge time two group : - A : standard care ( SOC ) receive intraoperative dexamethasone , ondansetron , ketorolac , general anaesthesia propofol , remifentanil cisatracurium - B : SOC + preoperative gabapentin , intraoperative lidocain infusion , s-ketamin droperidol . Primary endpoint : - postoperative ability time - discharge time PACU accord fix criterion - consumption analgesic antiemetic PACU Secondary endpoint : - degree nursing requirement PACU - General tolerability regime
